metadata.title: CVE-2015-8808 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The DecodeImage function in coders/gif.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.18 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (uninitialized memory access)via a crafted GIF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8808` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1
libgraphicsmagick++3 - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1
libgraphicsmagick3 - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1').
